Articles.Content:
I'll be doint a livestream in about 12 hours, maybe less depending on what happens when I wake up.

The main goal is simply getting the kethane mining operation working on Duna.

The channel is twich.tv/leax256.

I would like to point out I like backseat gamming and all opinions are welcolme.

more on the stream is that I'll be playing the Starbound soundtrack as background music.

conforming to the rules of starbound to be allowed to play said music

http://playstarbound.com/

Edited June 11, 2013 by leax256

This Livestream will be starting within 30 min.

I'm also testing kerbal live feed in the stream today.
